reviews.review: Amazing!!! Just a bit over long but other then that pretty much the perfect movie! Josh Brolin was amazing!

Avengers: Infinity War is the nineteenth fill in the ever expanding Marvel Cinematic Universe, and serves as the climax of the entire series thus-far. This film takes knowledge for granted. And, for good reason. You are completely ignorant to believe that walking into this film having only seen half of these films is enough to fully appreciate it. While I whole-hardheartedly believe that the action alone contradicts that, it is still hard for the nineteenth part of anything not to take some knowledge for granted. Having seen all of the MCU films, solely based on their characters and quality of story-telling (which had admittedly become repetitive until this film), I can say that for myself, this is without a doubt the best film in the universe, as it serves as a proper climax for a series, a new jumping off point, and a surprising, emotional film in its own right. It is a greatest hits of each character, sure, but it takes these events and emotions that we've grown to love over a decade and forces them in a position to either sacrifice them or die. And boy, do heads roll in ways that you didn't know you wanted to see. Bravo Marvel.
Great action and funny... the CGI was not 100% but pretty good. People in the theatre reacted the way the makers would have wanted.
completely mind blowing, this movie is a masterpiece
Quick. fun and fresh. That is what I wanted (looking at you Last Jedi)

I was impressed by the way so many stories were woven together almost seamlessly, it was visually incredibly appealing, and the action was beautiful. I went in slightly worried that it wouldn't feel natural but everything was effortlessly fluid. HOWEVER, my complaint is that he very beginning of the movie immediately pulled me out of the experience. I understand that it was picking up directly after Thor Ragnarok, but it didn't preface that, so I was immediately trying to figure out what was happening and why. By the time I put two and two together I was pulled out of the experience of the movie and it took half the movie for me to be drawn back in.
Amazing, this is how it looks 10 years of hard work.
Great juggling act by the Russo's. Great character interaction, unexpected actions and surprises, and leaves me really looking forward to the next instalment.

EPIC!!! It's the only word that can properly define this colossal movie. It's stunning, tragic, comedy, dynamic, serious, sad, great dialogues, awesome visual scenes, great sounds, it's simply ONE OF A KIND. Really. it's something bigger than a cinecomic, which elevates this great genre to another level. Love this huge cast, the Russos & screenwriters.. And All Hail To King Feige! PERFECT
